SELECT DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate) AS year,
TxnDate AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Week,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Month,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate) AS TxnDate,
o.DeptName AS deptName, l.LineName AS lineName, SUM (DebitFreeNum) AS debitFreeNum, SUM (DebitFreeAmount) AS debitFreeAmount, SUM (DebitNum) AS consumptionPerson, SUM (DebitAmount) AS consumptionAmount FROM BAR_DailySummary_Debit d LEFT JOIN OPT_Line l ON d.BusLineNO = l.LineCode LEFT JOIN OPT_Department o ON o.ID = l.DeptID
and o.DeptCode = #{deptCode} and l.LineCode = #{lineCode} and TxnDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} and d.MerchantCode = #{merchantCode}
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), TxnDate, deptName, lineName
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Week,TxnDate), deptName, lineName
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Month,TxnDate), deptName, lineName
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate), deptName, lineName
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), TxnDate DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Week,TxnDate) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Month,TxnDate) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate) desc
